name: CopyCat (itch) (PikaBush)
description:
You play as Mr. Lame. Mr. lame and his friend Mr. boring both copy each other's movements. In CopyCat, Boring and Lame need to collaborate to try to reach the door and find out the TRUTH.

  

           Note Download Brackeys2021.exe unzip it then play using exe. Your firewall may block you just click more info then allow.
